divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the pool sunday afternoon. I asked my oldest son to get me something to drink. When he return I looked up at him to say thank you and to get my drink. High in the sky but directly over his head I saw what seemed to be a silver cylinder object moving about the same speed lightening would move leaving a streak behind it.As it passed over head and out of my view, my old son and youngest son spotted it. Almost at the same time we all said did you see that?
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in West Monroe
There were no other sightings in West Monroe on or around June 22nd 2008
Summary: Lightening like UFO witness by 3 different people at the same time
